name: Borobudur Heritage Village by Bicycling
description: Immersing yourself with locals of Borobudur villages by visiting them and contact them in closest way. Wow...yes you will have an experience in How to make BATIK, tasting the most expensive coffee in the world LUWAK COFFEE, seeing the making of traditional JAVANESE brown sugar, Enjoying the sceneries of rice fields and tropical plants farming and also visiting traditional market of Borobudur....get your self blend with the way they live after you get amazed with the history of the largest Buddhist Temple in the World BOROBUDUR, plus the sacred temple of MENDUT and the UNESCO Icon temple,PAWON temple...you can do Rafting as well in ELO river for medium level rafting with the complimentary YOUNG COCONUT and JAVANESE snack and even DELICIOUS INDONESIAN MEALS for lunch!!!! interested???
